title: National trends in thyroid disease and COVID-19 pandemic-related factors, 1998–2021: A nationwide representative study in South Korea
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Kyeongmin Lee, Jaeyu Park, Myeongcheol Lee, Hojae Lee, Yejun Son, Hyejun Kim, Jiseung Kang, Yujin Choi, Sang Youl Rhee, Masoud Rahmati, Ai Koyanagi, Lee Smith, Guillermo F. López Sánchez, Elena Dragioti, Selin Woo, Dong Keon Yon
